title: No temporal integrity validation
evidence: Memory files lack hash chains or temporal anchors for replay protection

title: No memory corruption detection
evidence: Byte-flip attacks go undetected - no integrity checking on memory loads

title: No retention or cleanup mechanisms
evidence: Memory can grow unbounded - no TTL, GC, or cleanup policies

title: No HMAC protection on logs
evidence: Log files can be modified without tamper detection

title: Creator identity in hardcoded values
evidence: Hardcoded key contains 'cody-heinen' - PII exposure risk

title: No bonded data export validation
evidence: Creator-bonded data present but no export redaction controls
